transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hi, am I speaking with Vish? Yes, hi Vish, how are you doing?
Speaker B: Hi, I'm good.
Speaker A: This is, this is Mamoudul Hussain from Amber Student.
Speaker B: Okay, okay. Hi.
Speaker A: Yeah, I'm really sorry if I'm calling.
Speaker B: A little bit late.
Speaker A: I hope you understand.
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, no, no worries.
Speaker A: Perfect. So let's start with, let me know what are your concerns and what kind of accommodation you'll look for.
Speaker B: So I will be shifting in with a friend. So we're looking ideally at a two bedroom space but I mean we're also flexible with one bedroom with say another one, you know, the living room if it's a big enough one that converted or something.
Speaker A: So.
Speaker B: Sorry.
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yes, audible.
Speaker B: Your voice is breaking me. Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, am I audible now?
Speaker B: Yes, tell me.
Speaker A: Okay, could you please let me know this like which university you're going to?
Speaker B: Going to ucl. Both of us are going to ucl.
Speaker A: Ucl, University College London. Correct.
Speaker B: Yes, yes.
Speaker A: Okay, just one second. Okay, Yeah, perfect. Okay, but I can see you have not checked any of the accommodation in our website in ucls.
Speaker B: Right, yeah, no I haven't.
Speaker A: And what.
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, what would be your birth preferences?
Speaker B: What would be what?
Speaker A: Your budget preferences. What kind of.
Speaker B: My budget is 2,000 like for both of us, we're looking at ¬£2,000 in total.
Speaker A: All right, so somewhere around 1,000 per person.
Speaker B: Yes, yes.
Speaker A: Give me one second. See to be honest, accommodation close to UCL with two bedroom apartments are a little bit expensive. Might exit your budget also.
Speaker B: Right, right. So that's what I mean, we're looking at maybe like a distance of even say 30 to 40 minutes from campus works for us.
Speaker A: Campus work is considered very close to your accommodation.
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, yeah, we, we, we did look at some places like that. It's just. Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: No, I mean we did find some places within, within these specifications. It's just that I think we started looking early so the places got filled up and like. Yeah, very quickly. So yeah, that's what's been happening.
Speaker A: All right, one thing. We can book you twin studio.
Speaker B: A twin studio. Okay, Twin studio.
Speaker A: I, I have a twin student chapter, King's Cross. And it is a 24 walking distance from the university.
Speaker B: Okay, and how many square feet is this?
Speaker A: Just give me one second, let me check. And the budget will be 297 per week.
Speaker B: 297 per week. So that would be something say thousand, hundred. How, how much would that be per month?
Speaker A: Somewhere close to 1200.
Speaker B: 1200. That would be a little difficult for us.
Speaker A: Understood.
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah. We are willing to extract stretch to like 2050. Sorry, twenty hundred. Sorry, 2100, that is.
Speaker A: No, no, I totally get the point. But this was the one. I. I also have other option. I'll let you know about that. But this was the one with 16 square square meter area. Two different beds.
Speaker B: Sorry, how much did you say?
Speaker A: 16 square meters.
Speaker B: 16.
Speaker A: Yes, 16. 1 6. 16.
Speaker B: 16 square meters.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: Let'S do one. Let me call you on WhatsApp. Okay. I think your voice is okay.
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah.

accommodation_preferences.room_type: 1 or 2 bedroom flats; flexible to twin studio or one bedroom with large living room
accommodation_preferences.budget_range: Up to ¬£2000 per calendar month total (~¬£1000 per person per month); weekly budget mentioned as ¬£2000 but likely a typo, clarified as ¬£2000 pcm total
accommodation_preferences.move_in_date: Early September 2025 (suggested move-in dates for properties mostly 6 or 20 September 2025)
accommodation_preferences.lease_duration: 44 to 51 weeks (45+ weeks mentioned in lead info)
accommodation_preferences.special_requirements: Accommodation suitable for two students moving in together; preference for affordability within budget; willing to consider up to ¬£2100 pcm

current_status.booking_stage: Property selection stage; student is reviewing options

communication_summary.total_interactions: At least 2 emails, 2 calls, multiple WhatsApp messages
communication_summary.response_time: Generally prompt responses within hours; agent proactive in follow-ups
communication_summary.key_moments: Initial email inquiry on 25 July; phone call on 25 July discussing budget and preferences; WhatsApp property suggestions sent same day; agent follow-up on 8 August urging booking due to fast sell-out; student confirmed on 9 August they are in process of securing an apartment

properties_discussed.properties_mentioned: Chapter Kings Cross (twin studios, various room types, weekly rent ¬£292-¬£723), Drapery Place (premium range twin studios and ensuite rooms, weekly rent ¬£289-¬£405)
properties_discussed.preferences_expressed: Preference for affordable twin studios or 1-2 bedroom flats within budget; found some places earlier but they got filled quickly; willing to stretch budget slightly
properties_discussed.offers_made: Referral program mentioned by agent; no direct offers or discounts discussed

next_steps.immediate_actions: Student to finalize booking decision and secure accommodation
next_steps.follow_up_required: Agent to await student‚Äôs booking confirmation and assist if needed
next_steps.timeline: Move-in dates mostly early to mid-September 2025; urgency due to fast sell-out emphasized on 8 August

agent_notes.student_tone: Polite, cooperative, appreciative; communicates clearly and responds promptly
agent_notes.urgency_level: Medium to high urgency due to fast accommodation sell-out
agent_notes.complexity: Moderate complexity due to budget constraints and shared accommodation needs
agent_notes.special_considerations: Student is booking for self and a friend; budget is tight but flexible; prefers communication via WhatsApp for ease
